<<<<<<< HEAD
A congratulatory poem on the sitting of the great convention in the Parliament house at Westminster, January 22. 1688/9. Morley, Thomas, fl. 1689.
1 sheet ([1] p)
printed by W. Downing in Bartholomew. Close, London : [1689]
Verse - "Wise Senators! We much congratulate". Signed at end: Tho. Morley. Reproduction of the original at the Cambridge University Library.
